citations.narrative:
The open supplies of puppy food and bedding, in the area adjacent to the office, were not being kept in containers with
tightly fitting lids. The container for the puppy food did not have a lid, and the open bag of shavings were being stored in
their original plastic packaging.
It's important to store open supplies of food and bedding in containers with lids to ensure that they do not become
contaminated, lose their nutritive value, or attract pests.
All open supplies of food and bedding must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent contamination
and spoilage.
Correct by: 02/21/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
The open supplies of puppy food and bedding, in the area adjacent to the office, were not being kept in containers with 
tightly fitting lids. The container for the puppy food did not have a lid, and the open bag of shavings were being stored in 
their original plastic packaging.  
It's important to store open supplies of food and bedding in containers with lids to ensure that they do not become 
contaminated, lose their nutritive value, or attract pests.  
All open supplies of food and bedding must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent  contamination 
and spoilage.  
Correct by: 02/21/2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
